876550.name: Queen of Seas 2 - Original Sound Track
876550.description:
Queen of Seas 2 - Original Sound Track

Full original chiptune album from the game Queen of Seas 2.

Track list:
1- And the wave took it (2:31)
2- Unexpected shipwreck (2:30)
3- The prince is the beggar (3:16)
4- Caught by a shark (2:20)
5- 20 years of loneliness (2:33)
6- Dry waters (2:07)
7- Interrupted fishing (2:20)
8- Faithful villagers (2:24)
9- The return of the Queen (2:21)
10- Yemanja's festival (3:24)

Total lenght: 24 minutes

both .OGG and .MP3 files for each track

Sound track made by Derek Volker
876550.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
